courses.title: Competitive Programming Basics
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of competitive programming, including problem-solving strategies and algorithms.

courses.title: Mastering Data Structures
courses.description: Deep dive into essential data structures and their applications in competitive programming.

courses.title: Dynamic Programming Simplified
courses.description: Understand dynamic programming techniques to tackle complex problems effectively.

courses.title: Graph Theory for CP
courses.description: Explore graph algorithms and their use cases in solving competitive programming problems.

courses.title: Advanced CP Topics
courses.description: Learn advanced competitive programming concepts like segment trees, Fenwick trees, and more.

courses.title: Mathematics for CP
courses.description: Strengthen your mathematical skills to excel in competitive programming contests.

courses.title: String Algorithms and Pattern Matching
courses.description: Master string algorithms and pattern matching techniques for competitive programming challenges.

courses.title: Greedy Algorithms in CP
courses.description: Learn and apply greedy techniques to solve problems with optimal solutions.

courses.title: Introduction to Number Theory
courses.description: Explore number theory concepts crucial for solving modular arithmetic and related problems.

courses.title: Mock Contests and Strategies
courses.description: Participate in mock contests and learn effective strategies to enhance your performance.
